path: artifacts/MetaWhale Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.MetaWhale: contracts/MetaWhale Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/MetaWhale

findings.title: Old version of Solidity
findings.description: Using an old version prevents access to new Solidity security checks.

findings.title: Dead-code/Unused functions
findings.description: Unused internal function _burnFrom and unused function _burn.
findings.location: Contract, functions _burnFrom and _burn at lines 492 and 460 respectively.

findings.title: Token Decimals
findings.description: Token decimals may cause issues with other smart contracts that use/accept this token.
